struct in6_addr * CONVERT_ID2ADDR ( struct in6_addr *  result,
struct in6_addr *  prefix,
struct in6_addr *  id 
) [read]

Converts an ID & a prefix into an address.

Parameters:
[out] result The final address.
[in] prefix The prefix of the address.
[in] id The "ethernet type" address.
Returns:
The final address.
struct in6_addr * get_mn_addr ( pmip_entry_t *  bce  )  [read]

Computes the address of the mobile node corresponding to the supplied binding cache entry, store it in the binding cache entry and return it.

Parameters:
[in] bce A binding cache entry
Returns:
The address of the mobile node.
Note:
The returned address is returned using CONVERT_ID2ADDR function.
struct in6_addr * link_local_addr ( struct in6_addr *  id  )  [read]
Parameters:
[in] id The "ethernet type" address.
Returns:
The link local address corresponding to the supplied ethernet address.

Handler triggered by add_task_abs for entry expiry and deletion, expire PMIP binding cache entry and NS on MAG.

Parameters:

struct in6_addr * solicited_mcast ( struct in6_addr *  id  )  [read]

Converts an ethernet address into a Multicast Address for NS Unreachability.

Parameters:
[in] id The "ethernet type" address of a mobile node.
Returns:
The corresponding multicast address.
